column1: Harriet Trudell was instrumental in building Nevada’s progressive movement from her time with @SenatorReid to over 15 years serving as @NVDems political director.   Her death earlier this week was a loss for our state & I’m thinking of her family & friends during this time.
Always a pleasure to see the @DouglasDems.  Thank you for all your hard work to keep Nevada blue and for the warm welcome this weekend! https://t.co/BkckcsRjaW

Nevada is leading the way and setting a national example when it comes to getting women involved and elected.   I enjoyed meeting with women leaders in Reno this weekend to discuss how we can move our state forward together. https://t.co/ssNrvR8XJy

Had a fantastic time joining so many friends and colleagues at the Elect Democratic Women conference.  Women are 50% of the population.  It’s about time we represent at least 50% of Congress. https://t.co/XCqTPJk3oC

.@Astrid_NV is rightly one of the most sought-after Nevada endorsements for our Democratic presidential candidates.   Astrid is one of our country’s fiercest advocates for Dreamers and we’re lucky to have her in Nevada.  https://t.co/m4D78HpAUA
There are fewer than 100 days to Nevada’s caucus and @NVDems are fired up at tonight’s #FITW event! https://t.co/H4HExa0PXY

I found my way into politics after I had raised my family and had a career as a computer programmer.  Our paths are unexpected and it’s a reminder that anyone from any background can – and should – run for office. #NationalRunForOfficeDay
It was my honor to participate in today’s #VeteransDay Parade.   Thank you to our veterans who have sacrificed so much to protect our country and freedoms. https://t.co/y1a9aS1tKE

One year ago today we all achieved something incredible together.   I’m still overwhelmed with gratitude to serve as your Senator and I’ll keep waking up each day ready to fight for Nevada’s hardworking families.  Thank you Nevada.

👻 🎃 Happy Halloween!   This holiday can be scary but you know what’s scarier?   GOP attempts to take health care away from millions give a tax cut to giant corporations and do nothing to combat the climate crisis.   Let’s commit to electing Democrats up and down the ticket.
Happy Nevada Day! #HomeMeansNevada  https://t.co/x4BttckNNv
Fantastic to celebrate the Silver State in Carson City today at the #NevadaDay Parade! #HomeMeansNevada https://t.co/JQjznbITVR

This President and his policies have been a disaster for the Latino community in Nevada and across the country.   Next year we must hold him accountable by electing people who will fight for hardworking families.  https://t.co/Xvxu8wN1aJ

Nevada is home to many tribal communities and on #IndigenousPeoplesDay we celebrate their long history and contributions to our state and nation.   It’s critical that we lift up and honor their voices in our work and policy making.

🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈 As always I had a fabulous time at this year’s @VegasPRIDE parade tonight alongside @HRC.  We’ve made strides in the fight for full LGBTQ equality but still have work to do.   I’ll continue standing with our LGBTQ community – tonight and always. https://t.co/OoYpy5sFaf
I loved helping roll out the new @NVDems early voting sites at @Culinary226 yesterday! https://t.co/HgiffL0Gqs
.@NVDems are making early voting in the 2020 Democratic caucus easier than ever.   I'm excited to work alongside them to make next year's caucus our most successful yet. https://t.co/ncoRSXejOG

Fabulous seeing my friend @GabbyGiffords at today’s #2020GunSafety event in Las Vegas.  I’m honored to stand with her in this fight to end our gun violence epidemic.   Let’s do this. https://t.co/eLJHtsPlaA
Last year we turned Nevada blue together.   Now we're working to keep it that way.   Wonderful seeing so many friends at the annual @NVDems Keep Nevada Blue event! https://t.co/NnZCEzZud5
📋 Happy #NationalVoterRegistrationDay!   Join @NVDems in registering voters all across Nevada today ⬇️  https://t.co/PVbpMtJ3FR
Happy to see so many friends today for this year’s @RedRockDems BBQ! https://t.co/jg2zVpjjrz
Always great to meet with my friends at @naralnv!   I’ll continue to fight alongside you to defend reproductive freedoms. https://t.co/MbCXT8iPkz

We wouldn't have made it to the moon without the work of numerous women computer scientists programmers and mathematicians.  Many of these women have gone unrecognized for decades. On #Apollo50 we thank them for their contributions to this achievement. https://t.co/AIKRuovHgf

Last night I attended the annual “Rockets Over The Red Mesa” 4th of July celebration in Mesquite. Truly a spectacular evening full of great Nevadans amazing music and a spectacular fireworks show! https://t.co/QAkYvgo9sE

Happy 4th of July from Boulder City! So happy to participate in their annual Damboree Parade. Loved connecting with Nevadans flipping pancakes and seeing so many amazing floats! https://t.co/UkE55dhKPw

Thank you Emerge Nevada for your tireless work in helping to elect women by inspiring and helping them build the skills they need to run for office and succeed. I’m truly humbled to be named @EmergeNevada’s 2019 Woman of the Year! https://t.co/jfDdf8Leig

Congratulations on a successful 80th #NVLeg session Nevada! Our nation’s 1st female-majority legislature showed that when women lead we can do good work and improve the lives of hard-working families! #ElectMoreWomen

Nancy Kuhns was a true Nevada treasure who poured her heart and soul into fighting for justice equality and for a stronger better Nevada. She will be dearly missed but her legacy will last a lifetime. https://t.co/3Z9S6Prf9s

Victim-shaming is wrong and sets a dangerous precedent preventing survivors from coming forward with their stories. It has no place in society - and it especially has no place in politics. I strongly denounce these outrageous attacks. https://t.co/qlYBKE3s3L

Congratulations to @WillMcCurdyII on his election to a second term as Chair of @nvdems. I'm more than confident in your leadership & I look forward to what you'll be able to help Nevada accomplish in 2020. #Onward #NVDems https://t.co/Higz1MX5tx

So proud that Nevada State Assemblywoman Sandra Jauregui was nominated for the @emilyslist Gabrielle Giffords Rising Star Award! She's a champion for women who I'm happy to support.  You can cast your vote for @sandra4nv here >> https://t.co/LjD66XUkNf
Historic day. Can't wait to see what Speaker @JasonFrierson Majority Leader @katkinson702 and the first ever majority-women legislature will accomplish this year! https://t.co/qDVeCcCs9b
